page.title: 08Local Boy makes the Big Time
page.content: Ilkeston actor Robert Lindsay (real name Stevenson) is to star on New York's Broadway in 1986 in the smash hit 'Me and My Girl' which is now being performed at the Adelphi Theatre, London. Robert was born on 13.12.1949 at 5 Larklands Avenue, Ilkeston. He is the eldest of three children. He attended Kensington Infant and Junior schools and Gladstone Secondary School where he was given leading parts on school productions. When he left school he went to Clarendon College for a year's Drama course and was then accepted at RADA. From 1970 Robert has worked extensively in Theatre and on T.V., doing Shakespeare, musicals and comedy roles. Robert likes to relax by watching television. His hobbies include fishing, photography, calligraphy and football.
